  • Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics used by com.radirius.mercury.framework 
    Class and Description
    Batcher
    An OpenGL batcher that manages and pushes vertices.
    Camera
    An object for the camera.
    Graphics
    An object used to simplify rendering for those who do not wish to use the batcher.
  • Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics used by com.radirius.mercury.framework.splash 
    Class and Description
    Graphics
    An object used to simplify rendering for those who do not wish to use the batcher.
    Texture
    An object version of a texture.
  • Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics used by com.radirius.mercury.graphics 
    Class and Description
    Animation
    An easy to use animation class.
    Batcher
    An OpenGL batcher that manages and pushes vertices.
    Batcher.VertexData
    A class to hold the data of a vertex (position, color, and source coordinates).
    Camera
    An object for the camera.
    Color
    A class for a color that will hold R, G, B, and A values.
    FrameBuffer
    An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for end-processing effects.
    Graphics
    An object used to simplify rendering for those who do not wish to use the batcher.
    Shader
    An object version of shaders.
    SpriteSheet
    A class for spritesheets.
    SubTexture
    A class for sub-textures.
    Texture
    An object version of a texture.
  • Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics used by com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font 
    Class and Description
    SpriteSheet
